nodes.text: Gangrene was an ailment caused by exposure to the elements. The big game hunter Iothene Jacontro lost his right arm to gangrene. Despite the loss, he still went to the cold planet Vandor yearly to search its mountains in hopes of finding a living vastadon.
Gangrene was first mentioned in the 2018 reference book Solo: A Star Wars Story The Official Guide, written by Pablo Hidalgo.
